Title: The Keys to the House
Writer: Gianni Amelio (story and screenplay), Sandro Petraglia (story and screenplay), Stefano Rulli (story and screenplay), Giuseppe Pontiggia (novel)
Actors: Kim Rossi Stuart, Charlotte Rampling, Andrea Rossi, Alla Faerovich
Plot: Meeting his handicapped son for the first time, a young father attempts to forge a relationship with the teenager.
